Mayor & City Council
====================

Physical Address:

710 E. San Augustine St.  
Deer Park, TX 77536

Phone:

[(281) 478-7246](tel:2814787246)

Fax:

(281) 478-7218

[Email](mailto:cityhall@deerparktx.org)  
Link: [About City Council](https://www.deerparktx.gov/256/MAYOR-CITY-COUNCIL)
